Flub.Name: Mode
Flub.Description: Sets the processing method. The result can be dramatically different.

Flub.Name: Distance
Flub.Description: Creates an increasing slope from the "outline" of the shape towards its centerline.

Flub.Name: Slant
Flub.Description: Creates slopes like Distance but creates a steep slant as defined by the parameters.

Flub.Name: A
Flub.Description: Slant of the left slope. (Slant only)

Flub.Name: B
Flub.Description: Slant of the right slope. (Slant only)

Flub.Name: Angle
Flub.Description: Angle of the overall slant. (Slant only)

Flub.Name: Mirror Edges
Flub.Description: Mirror the edge pixels when there is empty space.
